column4: hello people im using a program called terminal server client and i want to connect to an xp pc. i have succesfully connected to one and i know how to use it but is there a way to connect without a password because the pc i want to connect to dosent have a password
i dont actually type anything in the password box and it tells me that i cant connect necause i have typed in the wrong password even though it dosent have one
sorry, im out of ideas for ya
